Global heat indexes see major shift

Countries around the world are experiencing major shifts in “what it feels like” temperatures from 2000 to 2025. These countries show the largest differences; the U.S. and mean are added for reference.

2000

Mean global temperature change: +0.6°F

+5.5°F

Germany

Bhutan

+4.3
